this builds a texture from a file. If cacheImage is true, then the image will be kept around for the life of the texture.

Definition at line 57 of file GrTexture.h.

GrImage* GrTexture::GetOwnedImage (  )  const [inline]

returns the owned image. Note that this is NULL if the texture came from a file and the texture is not told to keep the image around. It will also return NULL if the texture is a render target.

Definition at line 56 of file GrTexture.h.

void GrTexture::OwnedImageChanged (  ) 

public methods

this should only be called if the texture owns an image, and that owned image was changed.

must be from an owned image!

bind to a texture unit and upload.

Definition at line 113 of file GrTexture.cpp.

void GrTexture::SetHWShadowEnable ( bool  enable  ) 

turns on hardware shadow mode. This is only valid for depth/depth-stencil textures.

simply ignore if we're not of the appropriate format.

this is only a valid function call for depth textures!

direct upload of pixel data.

currently, we do not support compressed textures! In the future, we need to either add another function to upload compressed data or compress the incoming data automatically on the fly (or both?).
